Angular Resources

There is a wealth of documentation available for Angularjs and it is improving every day. Here are some amazingly awesome links to online Angularjs resources:

  • Angularjs API Reference   |   Primary Documentation for Angularjs (Wilson is using the stable 1.2.7 build)
  • Egghead IO   |   Incredible Angular Tutorial Videos
  • Karma Test Runner   |   Information about our test runner that we use to unit test our client-side code
  • Jasmine Unit Tests   |   API Reference and syntax guide to Jasmine unit tests in JavaScript

Wilson Resources

Detailed documentation for Wilson can be generated from the wilson project source code using grunt. To generate the documentation simply run this command from the project src directory:

grunt docs

Running this task should generate a content folder inside of the 'docs' directory. You can see the documentation by opening the index.html file located inside of the newly created 'content' directory.
